tool_description: Obtain and extract information about the leading users and their current and historical positions from OKX Copy Trading, one of the most prominent cryptocurrency exchanges globally.
name: OKX Copy Trading
title: OKX Copy Trading

api_list.name: getTraderHistoricalPositionsById
api_list.description: Returns all the detailed information of each of the closed positions that the trader had before.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Trader ID which can be retrieved from `/search` endpoint

optional_parameters.name: after
optional_parameters.description: Position Id that is required for the pagination on the historical data. `id` is the property that must be used.

api_list.name: getMarginPairs
api_list.description: Returns the list of pairs that OKX Margin contain.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://okx-copy-trading.p.rapidapi.com/exchange/margin/pairs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "okx-copy-trading.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://okx-copy-trading.p.rapidapi.com/exchange/margin/pairs"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getTraderPositionsById
api_list.description: Returns all the detailed information of each of the positions that the trader has. Working in real time.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Trader ID which can be retrieved from `/search` endpoint

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://okx-copy-trading.p.rapidapi.com/trader/D08BA87922C89DEB/positions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "okx-copy-trading.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://okx-copy-trading.p.rapidapi.com/trader/{id}/positions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "okx-copy-trading.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getSwapPairById
api_list.description: Returns an extensive information about a curreny or a pair from any OKX product.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Pair or currency ID that you want to get. `instId` on the `pairs` endpoints must be used.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: OKX Product that you want to retrieve the pair from.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://okx-copy-trading.p.rapidapi.com/exchange/pair/MARGIN/BTC-USDT"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "okx-copy-trading.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://okx-copy-trading.p.rapidapi.com/exchange/pair/{type}/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "okx-copy-trading.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getTraderById
api_list.description: Returns the profile information of the trader that matches up by the ID

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Trader ID which can be retrieved from `/search` endpoint

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://okx-copy-trading.p.rapidapi.com/trader/D08BA87922C89DEB"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "okx-copy-trading.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://okx-copy-trading.p.rapidapi.com/trader/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "okx-copy-trading.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: searchTraders
api_list.description: Returns all the traders that matches up by the filters

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Type of the leaderboard you want to retrieve

optional_parameters.name: aumHigh
optional_parameters.description: Highest limit of AUM in USDT

optional_parameters.name: leadTraderAssetsLow
optional_parameters.description: Lowest limit of Lead trader assets in USDT

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page for the pagination of the search results

optional_parameters.name: aumLow
optional_parameters.description: Lowest limit of AUM in USDT

optional_parameters.name: hasVacancies
optional_parameters.description: If the trader has availability to copy trade

optional_parameters.name: timeAsLeadTrader
optional_parameters.description: Time as the lead trader filter.

optional_parameters.name: leadTraderAssetsHigh
optional_parameters.description: Highest limit of Lead trader assets in USDT

api_list.name: getTradeStatsOfTraderById
api_list.description: Returns the 7 days, 30 days, 90 days and 1 year Trade Statistics information of a trader.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Trader ID which can be retrieved from `/search` endpoint

required_parameters.name: dateRange
required_parameters.description: Date range of the Trade Statistics for trader.

api_list.name: getFollowersOfTraderById
api_list.description: Returns the latest 100 followers of the trader that matches up by the ID

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Trader ID which can be retrieved from `/search` endpoint

api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "okx-copy-trading.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getPNLOfTraderById
api_list.description: Returns the historical PNL information of a trader with the timesamps

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Trader ID which can be retrieved from `/search` endpoint

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Type of the PNL information that needs to be retrieved.

api_list.name: getMaxDrawdownsOfTraderById
api_list.description: Returns the daily, weekly, and historical Max Drawdown information of a trader.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Trader ID which can be retrieved from `/search` endpoint
